ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function getToken(){	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("login_token"):"0f6bd1d063f202f71c3b84678027ce81"
	}
function getA(){
	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("account"):"萌友521068519938";
	}
function encode(word){
  	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).encryptBase64(word);
	}
function decode(word){
    	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).decryptStr(word);
}
    	
 function login(){
 	login_name=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号")
passwd=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    let jsonStr = {
        "login_name": login_name,
        "passwd": passwd,
        "app_signature_md5": "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94",
        "app_version": "4.1.1",
        "channel": "default"
    }
    let body = "secret_content=" + encode(JSON.stringify(jsonStr));
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    
    url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/login," + JSON.stringify(option)
    resp = JSON.parse(decode(java.ajax(url)))
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('❗️ ' + resp.tip + ' ❗️')
    }
}
</js>

	form=java.getElement("#article form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)

ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var bookid = baseUrl.match(/novel\/(\d+)/)[1];
//书评发送
const bookva = book.getVariable("custom");
if (bookva != false && bookva !== "" && source.getLoginHeader()) {
    const commenturl = `${GetUL()}/home/comment/add.html`;
    let body = `content=${bookva}&type=novel&mid=${bookid}`
  try {
    let code = String(java.getVerificationCode(`data:image/svg+xml;base64,${codesvg}`));
    if (code == "评论" || /^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
//java.log(code);
if (/^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
	   let contid = code.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
    body += `&pid=${contid}`
}
//java.log(body);
    let headers = {
        "x-requested-with": "XMLHttpRequest"
    }
    let ok = java.post(commenturl, body, headers).body();
    java.toast(JSON.parse(ok).msg);
    book.putCustomVariable("");
     } else {
     	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(40);
     	java.toast('请按图片要求填写');
     	book.putCustomVariable("");
     	}
    } catch(err) {
    	java.log(err);
    	book.putCustomVariable("");
    	}
  } else if(bookva != false && bookva !== "" && !source.getLoginHeader()) {
	java.toast("未登录，请登录后操作");
	book.putCustomVariable("");
}

try{
sourceinfo = source.getLoginInfoMap();
sourceinfo['书籍ID'] = bookid;
if (bookid) {
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(sourceinfo));
	}
$ = _ => java.getString(_);
img = /^https?/.test($('[property$=image]@content')) ? $('[property$=image]@content') : GetUL() + $('[property$=image]@content');
list = {
	               "ID": bookid,
                "img": img,
                "name": $('[property$=book_name]@content'),
                "author": $('[property$=author]@content'),
                "info": $('[property$=description]@content'),
                "url": "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src=" + baseUrl
            }
source.put("list",JSON.stringify(list));
} catch(err) {
	java.log("登录UI未初始化保存数据："+err);
	}
src;
</js>

<js>
try {

function d(a, b) {
b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.attr('data-real')||r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

@js:
con=`{{@@#author_say@html}}`
iv=src.match(/iv":"(.+?)"/)[1]
key=java.hexDecodeToByteArray('a15e2a7afc8c34a526efb8c6495e7b26')
	iv=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(iv)
	enc=src.match(/enc":"(.+?)"/)[1]
	enc=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(enc)
	c=java.createSymmetricCrypto('AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding',key, iv)
	b=c.decryptStr(enc)
b+con

<js>
list=[]
for(i in result){
	c=result[i]
	text=c.text()
	href=book.tocUrl+String(c.attr("onclick")).match(/\(\d+,(.*)\)/)[1]+'.html'
	if (list.length>0&&href==list[list.length-1].href){
		nexturl=book.tocUrl+String(result[i*1+1].attr("onclick")).match(/\(\d+,(.*)\)/)[1]+'.html'
		d=java.ajax(nexturl)
		href=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(d).select("#prev_url").attr("href")
		}
	list.push({text:text,href:href})
	}
list
</js>
